about_the_game: In Dungeon Grid, you take on the role of an ambitious wizard who grows stronger through a unique grid-based augmentation system. As you delve deeper into treacherous dungeons, you'll discover magical components that can be strategically attached to your character's upgrade grid. Each new addition enhances your abilities and can be combined in various ways to create powerful combinations. Navigate through mysterious chambers, battle fearsome monsters, and continuously evolve your wizard's powers by expanding and optimizing your personal upgrade grid. The game combines tactical grid-based customization with classic dungeon exploration and combat, offering players endless possibilities to craft their perfect wizard build.

short_description: Dungeon Grid is a roguelike where you play as a wizard who grows stronger by attaching components to their person machine. Explore dungeons, fight monsters, and customize your build through strategic grid-based power combinations.
